desc: Showcasing the versatility of the Native American flute through modern recordings, performances and products. Jonny Lipford empowers and teaches others how to play the Native American flute with ease.

layout.text:
My name is Jonny Lipford and I'm an award-winning performer, recording artist and educator of Native American flutes. 
I've helped thousands of new and seasoned flute players find inspiration in their flute journey so they feel motivated, creative and expressive and I know I can help you, too!
